attributes.action: Teach our young Cadet Force the basic signs of cancer
attributes.additional_details:
Knowing  the signs of cancer, doing it and then reporting it could save a young persons life. That's why I feel that monthly lessons would instil
the benefits of self examination and make the aware of their body
attributes.background: We want our Cadet Force to be taught the importance of self examination and signs of cancer at least fifteen minutes a month

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

The cadet forces are voluntary youth organisations, so decisions about what they teach cadets are a matter for each cadet force, not the UK Government or Parliament.
